00025 #ifndef SFML_CONTEXTSETTINGS_HPP
00026 #define SFML_CONTEXTSETTINGS_HPP
00027 
00028 
00029 namespace sf
00030 {
00036 struct ContextSettings
00037 {
00048     explicit ContextSettings(unsigned int depth = 0, unsigned int stencil = 0, unsigned int antialiasing = 0, unsigned int major = 2, unsigned int minor = 0) :
00049     depthBits        (depth),
00050     stencilBits      (stencil),
00051     antialiasingLevel(antialiasing),
00052     majorVersion     (major),
00053     minorVersion     (minor)
00054     {
00055     }
00056 
00058     // Member data
00060     unsigned int depthBits;         
00061     unsigned int stencilBits;       
00062     unsigned int antialiasingLevel; 
00063     unsigned int majorVersion;      
00064     unsigned int minorVersion;      
00065 };
00066 
00067 } // namespace sf
00068 
00069 
00070 #endif // SFML_CONTEXTSETTINGS_HPP
